tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-07-19 15:29:30" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value=" Thanks to diabolic-servers.com for the original v1 config." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-12-29 03:43:45" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATE_SYMLINK" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION" value="20" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION_UPDATE" value="2017-11-02 19:55:59" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_cmdlines.cmdline_default: +set net_ip $[Service.IpAddress] +set net_serverDedicated 1 +set net_serverPort $[Service.GamePort] +set net_serverPortMaster $[Service.QueryPort] +set net_serverPortAuth $[Service.CustomPort1] +set net_clientRemoteConsoleAddress $[Service.IpAddress] +set si_maxPlayers $[Service.Slots] +set exec_maxThreads 2 +exec server.cfg
tc_game_cmdlines.cmdline_private: +set net_ip $[Service.IpAddress] +set net_serverDedicated 1 +set net_serverPort $[Service.GamePort] +set net_serverPortMaster $[Service.QueryPort] +set net_serverPortAuth $[Service.CustomPort1] +set net_clientRemoteConsoleAddress $[Service.IpAddress] +set si_maxPlayers $[Service.Slots] +set exec_maxThreads 2 +exec server.cfg
tc_game_cmdlines.predef_cmdlines: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <ArrayOfPredefinedCommandLine xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <PredefinedCommandLine> <Id>9afe8cbb-e559-432b-92e1-7433e72cf850</Id> <CommandLine>+set net_ip $[Service.IpAddress] +set net_serverDedicated 1 +set net_serverPort $[Service.GamePort] +set net_serverPortMaster $[Service.QueryPort] +set net_serverPortAuth $[Service.CustomPort1] +set net_clientRemoteConsoleAddress $[Service.IpAddress] +set si_maxPlayers $[Service.Slots] +set exec_maxThreads 2 +exec server.cfg</CommandLine> <Description>Default</Description> </PredefinedCommandLine> </ArrayOfPredefinedCommandLine>
